---
title: Submit Signed Undelegate Transaction for Broadcast
slug: /staking/near/undelegate/submit-signed-undelegate-transaction
---

After signing the transaction, send a `PUT` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]/next` with the signed payload.
The Staking API will broadcast the transaction to the NEAR network.

### Parameters

- `name` &mdash; `string` Name of the action to execute (required).
- `inputs` &mdash; `object`
  - `transaction_payload` &mdash; Signed transaction payload from the previous step's response.

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash {5-8}
curl -X PUT 'https://near-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/4f866b7f-2e79-4c61-9bb4-398777c12a0b/next' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>' \
-d '{
  "name": "sign_undelegate_tx",
  "inputs": {
    "transaction_payload": ""
  }
}'
```

### Response

With the signed transaction provided, the Staking API will broadcast it to the network. As the transaction progresses towards confirmation, the returned state will be either:

- `undelegate_tx_broadcasting` &mdash; Transaction has been broadcast and is waiting confirmation.
- `cool_down` &mdash; Transaction has been confirmed and the delegation is unbonding.

#### Sample Response

```json {3,7}
{
  "id": "4f866b7f-2e79-4c61-9bb4-398777c12a0b",
  "state": "undelegate_tx_broadcasting",
  "actions": [
    {
      "name": "wait",
      "estimated_state_change_at": "2023-02-27T18:30:37.767Z",
      "inputs": []
    }
  ],
  "data": {
    "delegator_address": "0b81cc09294fc074814ad0de50f31644e5669f856105399b.testnet",
    "delegator_pubkey": "ed25519:NUbTcj78nHFFm1J8a1GFjenAnCKV32ZdBeeqem8oyLV",
    "validator_address": "legends.pool.f863973.m0",
    "max_gas": null,
    "undelegate_amount": "5.0",
    "undelegate_maximum": null,
    "undelegate_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "ab06236a0916604347fbbfc0c803d374fd28e6eb69f2edce3c2e6ac23e1f0452",
      "signed": " ",
      "hash": "CWc9R6SdHVwVHj1rhYiwBgK2sqkVdbBj1wG4QniUXwqT",
      "status": null,
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    },
    "estimated_inactive_at": null,
    "withdraw_amount": null,
    "withdraw_maximum": null,
    "withdraw_transaction": null
  },
  "network_code": "near",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2023-02-27T17:51:08.550Z",
  "updated_at": "2023-02-27T18:29:37.321Z"
}
```
